question: Use the following choices to answer the question:<image 1>
description:
The image shows a chemical equation representing a redox reaction:

\[ \text{CO}_2 + 8\text{H}^+ + 8e^- \longrightarrow \text{CH}_4 + 2\text{H}_2\text{O} \]

This equation describes the reduction of carbon dioxide (CO₂) to methane (CH₄) in the presence of protons (H⁺) and electrons (e⁻), resulting in the formation of water (H₂O). This type of reaction is characteristic of certain metabolic processes in microorganisms, particularly those involved in methanogenesis. Methanogens are archaea that produce methane as a byproduct of their metabolism, often under anaerobic conditions.
